title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Architecting Scalable AI Agents using Amazon Bedrock AgentCore (TNC330)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Amazon Bedrock AgentCore 构建可扩展 AI 代理架构 (TNC330)
abstract: Discover how to build powerful AI agents using Amazon Bedrock's suite of tools, with a focus on Amazon Bedrock AgentCore. This session explores AI agent architectures, from implementing Bedrock Flows to configuring knowledge bases and guardrails. Learn to design dynamic inline agents and understand multi-agent collaboration frameworks. We'll demonstrate how AgentCore's modular components enable you to create secure, enterprise-ready AI solutions that scale.
abstract_cn: 了解如何使用Amazon Bedrock工具套件构建强大的AI代理，重点关注Amazon Bedrock AgentCore。本次会议探讨AI代理架构，从实施Bedrock Flows到配置知识库和护栏。学习设计动态内联代理并理解多代理协作框架。我们将演示AgentCore的模块化组件如何帮助您创建安全、企业级的可扩展AI解决方案。
